title: Additional pool drainage improvements
description: Add two supplementary drain lines to prevent ponding on the east side of pool deck
reason: Unforeseen site condition - inadequate existing drainage discovered during resurfacing

title: Elevator cab interior upgrade to stainless steel
description: Upgrade elevator cab interiors from laminate to brushed stainless steel panels for all 4 cabs
reason: Owner-requested upgrade for improved aesthetics and durability

title: Parking lot LED lighting addition
description: Add 12 LED pole lights in parking garage levels P2 and P3 for improved safety
reason: Code compliance - updated Miami-Dade lighting requirements for parking structures

title: Emergency generator fuel line replacement
description: Replace corroded underground diesel fuel line from tank to generator room
reason: Emergency repair - fuel leak detected during load bank testing

title: Security camera conduit rerouting
description: Reroute camera conduit on floors 8-12 due to conflict with existing fire suppression piping
reason: Field condition - conduit path conflicts with existing sprinkler lines

title: Lobby fountain water feature addition
description: Add decorative water feature to main lobby as part of modernization
reason: Owner-requested enhancement to increase property appeal
